name: Potions!
description:
Potions! is an ingredient juggling, potion slinging, 2D, pixel-art shop management game

Brew and sell potions to customers during the day - prep during the night.
Unlock spells to help serve the ever increasing demand.
And move on to the next town in search of new ingredients, recipes and spells.
Before your time runs out...

Features

  • Buy ingredients and combine them to make potions for your customers! Travel to new regions to unlock new ingredients and recipes, learn them by heart or refer to your Recipe Book to keep your customers happy.

  • Unlock spells and use your magic to make your potions! Use your spells to aid you in your quest to deliver your potions on time. Sometimes mana potions are better for drinking than for selling!

  • Procedural colour mixing and physic fun! Combine ingredients to make colourful concoctions, while physics interactions will either aid you or turn your shop to chaos!

  • Endless unique customers! Serve a variety of procedurally generated customers from different races, as you make your way across the land.

  • Froggin will keep you company! Your enchanted frog will soothe you with local melodies.
